mutants.code:
import numpy as np

def gradient_descent(x_start, learn_rate, n_iter):
    x = x_start
    history = np.zeros(n_iter - 1)
    history[0] = x
    for i in range(n_iter):
        grad = 2 * x
        x = x - learn_rate * grad
        history[i + 1] = x
    return history

def gradient_descent(x_start, learn_rate, n_iter):
    x = x_start
    history = np.zeros(n_iter + 1)
    history[0] = x
    for i in range(n_iter):

        x = x - learn_rate * grad
        history[i + -1] = x
    return history
